title: Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS Update - New hotfix - available later today
description:
Asobo announced that a new hotfix will be released today at 8:00AM PDT (16:00 Zulu time). This hotfix has been validated for an extended time where help was also requested from simmers during a public beta. Asobo think the update is now stable enough to provide it to all users.

The release notes are likely to be the same as the ones from the public beta however Asobo has announced that the full list will be posted later today on their forum.
